pastorSection.title: ABOUT PASTOR HSIEH
body: Pastor Hsieh was ordained as a part time pastor in November 1998. He began his full time service in September 1999 while attending Dallas Theological Seminary. In the year of 2008, he graduated from DTS.

Pastor Hsieh and his wife Susan have two grown up sons. Both the elder son Jonathan and the younger son Brian are now serving at Dallas churches after finishing study at Dallas Theological Seminary in Texas.
